Name: Dataset of psychophysiological measures collected from children with learning difficulties who engaged in reading and mathematics activities using assistive technology.
Acknowledgements: The authors thank Tecnologico de Monterrey and CONAHCYT for providing financial support for developing this research. In addition, the authors are grateful to the company Smartick for granting free access to the online method for learning.
EthicsApprovals: April 28, 2023: Neuroscience Institute of University of Guadalajara Ethics Committee (Reference: ET122022-356)
